scripts.say: Hold, Matsuri. I'm receiving a message from Zuikaku.
Siren aircraft are bombing "a giant wooden castle." Target is believed to be one of the Hololivers. Heading there to provide support.
... End of transmission. Seems we've located one of your friends.
Giant wooden castle...? Wait, that sounds like... Nakiri Castle! Ayame should be there! We'd better go help her!
